casebody.data:
ABE FELDSTEIN v. STATE OF MARYLAND [No. 28,

October Term, 1942.]

Decided October 15, 1942. The cause was argued before Bond, C. J., Delaplaine, Collins, Marbury, and Grason, JJ. Leonard J.. Harmatz for the appellant. William C. Walsh, Attorney General, and Robert E. Clapp, Assistant Attorney General, with whom was Morgan C. Harris, State’s Attorney for Allegany County, on the brief, for the appellee. Marbury, J.,

delivered the opinion of the Court.
